str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
From dikaios; to render just or innocent.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Near, nearby, a neighbor. Neuter of a derivative of pelas; close by; as noun, a neighbor, i.e. Fellow.
